author: jmachols
msg: Enabled the nexus and all backends to carry handle on ClientManager so
they can call getClientSession().  This required a new dependency within
the ClientModule for the UnifiedBackend.  Please update all assembly.xml
to add this new dependency as well as adding the phoenix xdoclet tag to
create the dependency within the ClientModule.xinfo.

author: jmachols
msg: Refactored event handler for readability and added hooks to associate and
disassociate protocol stage worker thread with client on the ClientManager.

author: jmachols
msg: Added changes to ClientModule implementation to bring us towards a cleaner

author: akarasulu
msg: Factored some notes back into docs given to Jeff for changes to the Client
